summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 6 February to end of Sunday 6 February GMT
description: Rain early on Sunday, easing but remaining cloudy.<br/><br/>Throughout the day a 'clean' westerly Atlantic breeze is forecast. Wind freshening later and arriving on a path from the north Atlantic. Good dispersion of any local pollution is expected.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
